## What is «Break-Glass»

<hr>

<br>

>Break-glass access refers to a procedure used in critical emergencies or
exceptional cases, when a user with insufficient access is granted elevated
access rights to bypass normal access controls. -- SSH Academy (ssh.com)

![Break-Glass Key](/src/images/break-glass.png){width=25% fig-align="center" #fig-bg-key}

:::aside
For more details please read
[What is Break-Glass Access?](https://www.ssh.com/academy/secrets-management/what-is-break-glass-access){target=_blank}
:::
